https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin._instruction: Add the coordinate framework in which this coordinate point exists in.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.label: Coordinate framework
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.name: coordinateFramework

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin._instruction: Enter the coordinates of this point within the stated coordinate space for two-dimensonal spaces as [x, y] or for three-dimensional space as [x, y, z].
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.description: Pair or triplet of numbers defining a location in a given coordinate space.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.label: Coordinates
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.name: coordinates
